name: textdraw
description: I want to create a app for brainstorming/writing down new ideas.  I want half the page to be a textarea where I can write details about the ideas/project then can save it to a .txt file. The other half of the screen would be a canvas that I can paint to then save it as a png.  The .txt and .png would share the same name? and then be sent to a directory.
